[ARG0: The U.S. Senate] confirmed President Donald Trump 's pick of Mike Pompeo for secretary of state Thursday , [V: giving] [ARG2: the CIA director] [ARG1: final approval to formally takeover the high - profile diplomatic role] .

The U.S. Senate confirmed President Donald Trump 's pick of Mike Pompeo for secretary of state Thursday , giving [ARG0: the CIA] director final approval to [ARGM-MNR: formally] [V: takeover] [ARG1: the high - profile diplomatic role] .
